question: What is your favorite Youtube channel and why?

What’s item in your house sparks the most joy?
What procrastination activity do you waste the most time doing?
What pets do you have or would like to have?

What is a popular trend that you wish would go away?

What is the education system like in your country?
What sports or physical exercise do you do most often? Why?
How do you usually meet new friends? Where do people in your country / region typically meet friends?
Is it harder to make new friends when you are not in school anymore? Why or why not?

What do you (or did you) dislike the most about school?
When you were a child, what was your dream profession?

What is your favorite fairy tale?
What is the strangest fairy tale from your country / culture?
